title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Mathematics Teacher Professional Development Using Simulation-Based Lesson Study

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and foundational understanding of classroom management
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participants can achieve over 80% alignment between learning objectives and activities when designing math lessons in VR simulations
Participants improve question quality during virtual learner interactions by at least 1 level (on a 3-tier scale: advanced/intermediate/basic)
Participants can complete over 90% of lesson improvement plans through peer teacher feedback sessions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
